title: Waters Announces January Committee Schedule
summary: Today, Congresswoman Maxine Waters (D-CA), Chairwoman of the House Committee on Financial Services, announced the following update to the schedule for the month of January: RESCHEDULED - January 19 at 10:00 AM ET: The Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations will convene for a virtual hearing entitled, â€œEnsuring Equitable Delivery of Disaster Benefits to Vulnerable Communities and Peoples: An ...
